state: The dinner is almost ready! It's only missing a grilled half of a bag of chips. -= Bedroom =- You've seen better bedrooms, but at least this one seems pretty normal. You see a chest drawer. Suddenly, you bump your head on the ceiling, but it's not such a bad bump that it's going to prevent you from looking at objects and even things. A closed antique trunk is nearby. You can make out a king-size bed. The king-size bed is normal. But the thing is empty. There is a closed wooden door leading east. > -= Bedroom =-0/1
You open the chest drawer, revealing an old key. > -= Bedroom =-0/2
admissible_commands: take old key from chest drawer
optimal_action: take old key from chest drawer

state: You take the old key from the chest drawer. > -= Bedroom =-0/3
admissible_commands: insert old key into chest drawer
put old key on king-size bed
unlock wooden door with old key
optimal_action: unlock wooden door with old key

admissible_commands: insert old key into chest drawer
lock wooden door with old key
put old key on king-size bed
insert old key into chest drawer
put old key on king-size bed

state: -= Kitchen =- You find yourself in a kitchen. An ordinary kind of place. You begin looking for stuff. You hear a noise behind you and spin around, but you can't see anything other than a refrigerator. You can make out a counter. Make a note of this, you might have to put stuff on or in it later on. But the thing is empty. You make out a stove. But the thing is empty. Look over there! a kitchen island. On the kitchen island you make out a note. There is a closed screen door leading east. There is an open wooden door leading west. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. Your score has just gone up by one point. > -= Kitchen =-1/6
admissible_commands: put old key on kitchen island

state: You open screen door. Your score has just gone up by one point. > -= Kitchen =-2/7
admissible_commands: put old key on kitchen island

state: -= Backyard =- You arrive in a backyard. An usual kind of place. Oh wow! Is that what I think it is? It is! It's a set of chairs. The set of chairs is ordinary. Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it. Oh! Why couldn't there just be stuff on it? You see a bbq. But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of trash. You can see a patio table. Why don't you take a picture of it, it'll last longer! The patio table is normal. However, the patio table, like an empty patio table, has nothing on it. There is an open screen door leading west. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south. > -= Backyard =-2/8
admissible_commands: put old key on patio table
put old key on set of chairs

state: -= Garden =- You are in a garden. A standard one. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. There is a half of a bag of chips, a tomato plant, a milk and a shovel on the floor. > -= Garden =-2/9
admissible_commands: examine half of a bag of chips
take half of a bag of chips
optimal_action: take half of a bag of chips
